label: Federal Repository · Washington, D.C.
title: National Archives (NARA)
body: Primary custodian of the JFK Assassination Records Collection under the JFK Records Act of 1992. Holds millions of pages from over 60 government agencies.

label: Federal Repository · NSA
title: NSA Historical Releases — JFK
body: National Security Agency signals intelligence records declassified under the JFK Records Act transparency initiative.

label: Presidential Library · Boston, MA
title: John F. Kennedy Presidential Library
body: Official presidential library housing Kennedy's personal papers, White House records, oral histories, and photographs from his administration.

label: Presidential Library · Austin, TX
title: Lyndon B. Johnson Presidential Library
body: Holds records from the Johnson administration including Warren Commission materials, post-assassination transition files, and related correspondence.

label: Presidential Library · Ann Arbor, MI
title: Gerald R. Ford Presidential Library
body: Contains Ford's files as a Warren Commission member, including working papers, interview notes, and correspondence during the 1964 investigation.

label: Independent Archive · Digital
title: Mary Ferrell Foundation
body: Largest independent online repository of JFK assassination records. Hosts over 1.5 million digitized pages cross-referenced with the NARA collection.

label: University Archive · Hood College, MD
title: Harold Weisberg Archive
body: Personal research archive of assassination critic Harold Weisberg. Contains correspondence, FOIA responses, and original investigative documents spanning four decades.

label: University Archive · Waco, TX
title: Baylor University Poage Library — JFK Collection
body: Academic collection of materials related to the Kennedy assassination, including congressional records and regional Texas documents.

label: Independent Archive · Washington, D.C.
title: Assassination Archives and Research Center (AARC)
body: Non-profit repository specializing in political assassination records. Holds unique materials obtained through FOIA and private donation since 1984.

label: Museum Archive · Dallas, TX
title: Sixth Floor Museum at Dealey Plaza
body: Located in the former Texas School Book Depository. Maintains oral histories, photographs, and artifacts related to the assassination and its aftermath.

label: Independent Archive · Digital
title: The Black Vault — JFK Records
body: FOIA-driven digital archive. Hosts thousands of declassified government documents obtained through independent records requests.

label: Independent Archive · Digital
title: History Matters
body: Online archive of Warren Commission testimony, exhibits, and investigative records. Cross-referenced with HSCA and ARRB materials.

label: University Archive · Denton, TX
title: University of North Texas — JFK Portal
body: Digitized Texas-based JFK materials from the UNT Texas History Portal, including Dallas-area news coverage and municipal records.

label: University Archive · Arlington, TX
title: University of Texas Arlington Libraries
body: Special collections including regional Texas history materials pertaining to the Kennedy assassination and the Dallas political climate of 1963.

label: Municipal Archive · Dallas, TX
title: Dallas Municipal Archives
body: City of Dallas government records including Dallas Police Department files, city council records, and official communications from November 1963.

label: Public Library · Dallas, TX
title: Dallas Public Library — History Division
body: Holds local history materials, newspaper archives, and photographic collections documenting Dallas in November 1963.

label: University Archive · Medford, MA
title: Tufts University Tisch Library — JFK Collection
body: Academic database access to the JFK Assassination Collection. Digitized primary sources available for scholarly research.

label: University Archive · Washington, D.C.
title: National Security Archive (GWU)
body: George Washington University non-governmental research institute. Holds declassified CIA covert operations files and briefing books on the Kennedy assassination records.

label: Industrial · Dallas, TX
title: Texas Butchers Supply Company
body: Privately owned company in Dallas where Ralph Leon Yates was employed as a refrigeration mechanic in 1963.
